messages.subject: Unschooling Confrence in Houston
messages.msgSnippet: For anyone who is interested a HUG, Houston Unschoolers Group, is having an unschooling conference in October. Here is the info for anyone who is interested.
messages.messageBody:
For anyone who is interested a HUG, Houston
Unschoolers Group, is having an unschooling conference
in October. Here is the info for anyone who is
interested. Corallyn


> Houston Unschoolers Group Family Learning Conference
> Houston's Conference For ALL Homeschoolers!
> Sponsored by Home Education Learning Magazine!
> http://www.helmonline.com
> Oct. 6 & 7, 2000
> San Jacinto Community College North, 5800 Uvalde,
> Houston, Texas
> Keynote speakers are Jean Liedloff and Daniel Quinn.
> Features include elist meetings, vendors, workshops
> for adults, children
> and teens, family dance, children's history festival
> and more!!
> For more information visit:
> http://www.angelfire.com/tx/wlr/conference.html
> Call or email:
> (713)695-4888/houstonunschoolersgroup@...
>
> Thanks!
>
